markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Class Feats](/Rules.aspx?ID=142)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 68 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
This section specifies the levels at which your character gains class feats—special feats that only members of that class can access. Class feats are granted beginning at 1st or 2nd level, depending on the class. Specific class feats are detailed at the end of each class entry.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Class Feats
search_markdown:

Chapter 3: Classes / Reading Class Entries / Class Features
</additional-info>
text: Class Feats Source Core Rulebook pg. 68 4.0 This section specifies the levels at which your character gains class feats—special feats that only members of that class can access. Class feats are granted beginning at 1st or 2nd level, depending on the class. Specific class feats are detailed at the end of each class entry.
